summary: Residents of an enclosed neighborhood in the middle of Mexico DF are shocked by a violent crime, and for one resident in particular, young Alejandro, the drama is ratcheted up when he encounters the lone kid who escaped the event and is hiding out within the neighborhood's borders.
cast: Daniel Giménez Cacho|Daniel Tovar|Alan Chávez|Carlos Bardem|Mario Zaragoza|Marina de Tavira|Maribel Verdú|Fernando Becerril|Andrés Montiel|Claudio Obregón|Blanca Guerra|Mayra Serbulo|Asur Zagada|Germán Valdés III|Pablo Aron López|Enrique Arreola|Gerardo Taracena|Tenoch Huerta|Miriam Balderas|Diego Cataño|Claudio Pastor|Fernando Banda|Mayahuel del Monte|Alejandro Bracho|Claudia Becker|Concepción Márquez|Juan Pablo Cueva Berea|Eileen Yañez|Fermín Martínez|Gerardo Martínez|Juan José de la O.|Iñaki Goci|Celin Bosques|Eduardo Cassab|Josefo Rodríguez|Ricardo Fernández-Deu|Noe Alvarado|Ignacio Pla|Margarita Wynne
title: La zona
